tool_description: An API that provides easy and efficient access to both OpenSea's GraphQL API and OpenSea's Testnet GraphQL API.
name: OpenSea GraphQL
title: OpenSea GraphQL

api_list.name: (Advance) X-Signed-Query & Payload [BETA]
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a verified request template based on the latest consecutive request.

test_endpoint.message: This endpoint is disabled for your subscription

api_list.name: Opensea GraphQL Testnet
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://opensea-graphql3.p.rapidapi.com/testnets/__api/graphQL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opensea-graphql3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
